product_name: Louis Garneau Icefit Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: When your road begins to climb, you'll be glad you're riding in the men's Louis Garneau Icefit Bike Jersey. Its special fabric and mesh paneling actually help make you feel cooler. Icefit fabric with Icefil(R) lowers your body temperature through evaporation. Back and underarm mesh air intakes excel at moving sweat off your skin and letting your jersey dry quickly. Jersey offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Mini-stitching improves stretch without restricting movement. Opaque Gladiator Grip at hem keeps jersey in place without bulk. Full-length front zipper; 3 angled back pockets with reflective trim. Louis Garneau Icefit Bike Jersey for men enhances your visibility with reflective trim on front and back.
short_description: When your road begins to climb, you'll be glad you're riding in the men's Louis Garneau Icefit Bike Jersey. Its special fabric and mesh paneling actually help make you feel cooler.
